com.xtructure.xevolution.operator
Interface CrossoverOperator<D>

Type Parameters:
D - type of data used by Genomes on which this operator is applied.
All Superinterfaces:
EvolutionObject, Operator<D>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArithmeticCrossoverOperator, ArithmeticCrossoverOperator, CopyCrossoverOperator, StandardCrossoverOperator
public interface CrossoverOperator<D>
extends Operator<D>

The CrossoverOperator interface describes the methods used in reproduction via crossover, or simply, with a pair of parents.

Author:
Luis Guimbarda

Method Detail

crossover

Genome<D> crossover(int idNumber,
                    Genome<D> genome1,
                    Genome<D> genome2)
                    throws Operator.OperationFailedException
Create a child Genome using the given parent Genomes.

Parameters:
idNumber - the instance number for the id of the child Genome
genome1 - the first parent Genome
genome2 - the second parent Genome
Returns:
the child Genome
Throws:
OperationFailedException - If this crossover operation cannot be applied to the given Genomes.
Operator.OperationFailedException
